attributes.action: Let all airlines allow pets in the airplanes' cabin to and from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: There are a lot of foreigners living regularly in the UK and they have pets. However we need to see our families back home and leaving the dog in UK is expensive and not safe. Letting dogs travelling in the hold is inhumane.
attributes.background: I want the parliament to reconsider the animal's right in general starting with letting them fly abroad with their families in the plane's cabin.
